Barney Ross.Action: Addresses the pirate leader calmly and keeps focus on freeing hostages by negotiating the ransom amount without aggression.

Shows patience and trust in his team despite the dangerous situation and provocations.

Commands 'No firing till you're down!' to protect hostages during chaotic battle.
Commands his team with clear instructions during a chaotic situation, telling them 'No firing till you’re down!'
Quickly rappels into protective smoke with his team, showing readiness and coordination.
Does not escalate tensions unnecessarily despite Gunnar's aggression, maintaining control of the team.
Ducks then spins out and fires off eight shots hitting two armed pirates, then speed loads and fires six more in less than 3 seconds, blowing a pirate off his feet.

Lowers his pistols and others lower weapons despite pirate threats to hostages' lives.

Despite damage to the plane’s fuselage, confidently maneuvers the aircraft to turn the situation around.
